cause.description:
This is a great cause to raise money for kids who have disabilities. Lets help these kids acheive their goals. If I can raise $1500, I will have a chance of a life time to rappel down the side of an office tower downtown Toronto.
To donate, please visit my donation page at:
https://secure.e2rm.com/registrant/personalPage.aspx?EventID=7832&LangPref=en-CA&RegistrationID=279200
Main website is www.thedropzone.ca
1. Helping kids who aren't as fortunate as most of us.
cause.mission: Raise money for kids with disablities.
cause.name: Easter Seals Society (Drop Zone)
